The music in Ben-Hur was composed by Miklós Rózsa, and the score is considered one of the greatest film scores of all time. The music has a grand and epic quality which complements the scale of the film and adds drama, emotion, and tension to the key scenes. The use of different instruments to represent different characters and themes also added depth and complexity to the score. It was brilliantly composed, and it further contributed to the overall success of the film.
